author: Stuti Agarwal
title: Celebs who have adopted kids
text:
Once the only resort for childless couples, adoption is now the buzzword among celebrities who are adopting children for, well, reasons other than just being childless.
Some have travelled the world to have that rewarding experience and find that one (or more) kid they can nurture, and call their own. Here we look at some celebs who have adopted kids over the years.
READ: Sandra Bullock defies Bollywood's gravity
SANDRA BULLOCK Sandra Bullock reportedly adopted a baby girl this month, as she wanted a sister for her son Louis, who she adopted in 2010. Interestingly, Sandra had made the announcement about Louis the same day she announced her divorce from Jesse James.Sandra Bullock with son Louis
ANGELINA JOLIE Angelina adopted her first child, Maddox Chivian, in 2002 from Cambodia, when she was still with her exhusband, Billy Bob Thornton.In 2005, Angelina and Brad Pitt adopted Zahara Marley from Ethiopia. In 2007, the couple adopted son Pax Thien from Vietnam. This apart, the couple has three biological children -Shiloh and twins Vivienne and Knox.
CATE BLANCHETT In March this year, Cate Blanchett and her husband Andrew Upton adopted a little girl named Edith Vivian Patricia Upton. She and Upton already have three biological sons Dashiell, 12, Roman, 10 and Ignatius, 6.Cate spotted with baby Edith
HUGH JACKMAN Hugh Jackman and his wife Deborra-Lee Furness adopted two children -Oscar Maximillian and Ava Eliot -after the couple suffered two miscarriages.Hugh Jackman with his boys
MEG RYAN Though Meg Ryan has already had a child, Jack Quaid, with husband Dennis Quaid, she later adopted a 14-monthold girl from China named Daisy True.Meg with daughter Daisy True
SHARON STONE Sharon Stone, when married to Phil Bronstein, adopted a baby boy named Roan Joseph in 2000. After they divorced, Phil got primary custody. Sharon later adopted her second son Laird Vonne and then her third son Quinn Kelly.Sharon Stone with her boys
MADONNA Madonna, who has two biological children Lourdes and Rocco Ritchie with her exes, later adopted two more children, David Banda and Mercy from Malawi.Madonna with her kids
KATHERINE HEIGL In 2009, Katherine and her husband, Josh Kelley, adopted their daughter Nancy Leigh Mi-Eun Kelley, from South Korea. In April 2012, they adopted their daughter Adalaide Marie Hope from the US.
TOM CRUISE AND NICOLE KIDMAN Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman, when married, adopted two children together -Isabella Jane (1992) and Connor Anthony (1995). However, Isabella, who got married last month, did not invite her adoptive parents to her wedding. Nor did Connor show up.
VIOLA DAVIS In 2011, Viola Davis and husband Julius Tennon adopted their daughter Genesis eight years into the marriage. Viola is also the stepmother to Julius's two sons from a previous relationship.Viola with her daughter Genesis
SHERYL CROW Sheryl Crow, who has always said motherhood is the top priority in her life, adopted her son, Wyatt, in 2007, when he was just two weeks old.In 2010, she also adopted another son, Levi James.
